title: You vs 100 Skibidi Toilets

headings.text: How to Play You vs 100 Skibidi Toilets

controls: Move: WASD or arrow keysRoll / Jump / Climb: SpaceShoot: Left mouse buttonAim: Right mouse button (hold)Reload: RChange Weapon: Mouse wheelWeapon Hotkeys: 1 - 6
content.howToPlay: Arrange your loadout and make sure you have enough ammo for 100 skibidis hungry for the cameraman.Hit the play button and enter the field. Shoot'em all.You can explode barrels by shooting to clear multiple enemies at once.Check out the weapon and skin shops for more customized gameplay.
content.developer: You vs 100 Skibidi Toilets is made by GoGoMan.

fullContent: Home› Skibidi ToiletYou vs 100 Skibidi ToiletsBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenOk, cameraman! We hope you're ready for action! Because 100 Skibidi toilets wait for you to hunt you down. Arrange your loadout with shotguns, rifles, throwables, wear your best suit and enter the arena to flush them all.You vs 100 Skibidi Toilets is a 3D third person shooter game with funny visuals and engaging gameplay. Learn the controls below and start playing it on your browser right away. If you enjoy the chaotic fun of You vs 100 Skibidi Toilets, you'll love playing more Skibidi Toilet Games Online. These games offer wacky scenarios where you can continue your battle against the mischievous Skibidi toilets. Visit OnlineGames.io for a library of Skibidi games that will keep you entertained for hours with their humorous visuals.ControlsMove: WASD or arrow keysRoll / Jump / Climb: SpaceShoot: Left mouse buttonAim: Right mouse button (hold)Reload: RChange Weapon: Mouse wheelWeapon Hotkeys: 1 - 6How to Play You vs 100 Skibidi ToiletsArrange your loadout and make sure you have enough ammo for 100 skibidis hungry for the cameraman.Hit the play button and enter the field.
